name: LikeList
tag_list: local-search, search, reviews, recommendations, referrals, local, restaurant-reviews, likes, lists, social-networks, friends, silicon-valley, deals, local-deals, groupon, living-social, yelp, angies-list
overview:
LikeList is the simplest way to save, share and find lists of businesses you can trust.

LikeList was founded and is lead by several family guys who’re passionate about easily connecting their families, friends, colleagues and communities with valuable and trusted local businesses.

What Weâ€™re All About Local Trust. Knowing the person who refers you to a local business makes the recommendation more trustworthy. Simplicity. Itâ€™s easy to find trusted businesses, easy to recommend them, and easy to organize and access their offers and incentives. Value. You get fast, direct access to local businesses you trust, which makes their offers and incentives more valuable. The Details

LikeList is the place where people who know each other and think alike share lists of their favorite local businesses.

People trust referrals from friends and family more than those from strangers. Sometimes knowing who is making a recommendation is just as important as which businesses theyâ€™re recommending. LikeList helps you get more value from your trusted local businesses.

By â€œlikingâ€ businesses, or putting them onto your TryList, you create a way for them to share special promotions, coupons or other deals with you. LikeListâ€™s local online services make us a natural champion of local communities and their economies.

Locally owned businesses make stronger communities. $45 of every $100 spent with a local business stays in the community, vs. $13 of every dollar spent with a national chain.1 So, Whatâ€™s in it For You?

What if you could get five recommendations for quality local auto mechanics from all of the people in your personal network, and at the same time see offers and coupons from them?

What if you could plan a weekend trip to the North Shore of Lake Tahoe and, in one click, see which hotels, rental properties, snowmobile tours, restaurants and evening dance or blues places your friend or group of friends like and highly recommend?

What if you could access the local knowledge of your friends, neighbors and acquaintances 24x7 for anything you might need near or far from home?

LikeList saves you time, money and worry.

1Small-Mart Revolution: How Local Businesses are Beating the Global Competition, Michael H. Shuman, 2006

LikeList is funded by venture capital firm Syncom Venture Partners which specializes in media and communications business investing particularly in underserved markets.
